About me As a seasoned Graphic Designer with a focus on webpage design, I specialize in creating visually compelling and user-friendly digital experiences. With a deep understanding of design principles and a passion for aesthetics, I bring concepts to life, ensuring that every webpage I design not only looks great but also functions seamlessly.More about me >

Years of experience 					I've learned different branches relative to graphic designing. I managed to engaged myself in photography, videography, video editing, multimedia design, web development and interior design.I’m passionate about delivering designs that elevate brand presence and engage audiences effectively. 				 			 			 				 					 						 							150 						 					 					 						Successful projects 					 						Bringing dreams to life with 150+ successful projects, turning ideas into real-world results.

Projects As a seasoned Graphic Designer with a focus on webpage design, I specialize in creating visually compelling and user-friendly digital experiences. With a deep understanding of design principles and a passion for aesthetics, I bring concepts to life, ensuring that every webpage I design not only looks great but also functions seamlessly.

ClientGREE PhilippinesServicesVideography & Photography, Video Editing, Digital Content, Planning, Video Director, WardrobeTechnologiesAfter Effects, Photoshop 				 			 			 				 				 				GREE Philippines got Alex Gonzaga, a Philippines’ known actress, as its first ambassador on year 2022. The project is to make an advertising campaign with GREE ambassador through out the year in every media and platforms.1. Create a static layout with and without GREE products together with the ambassador.2. Create short video of introductory of the new ambassador.3. Create different kinds of advertising materials (Catalogues, Flyers, etc.) that will be given to end users as well as dealers nationwide.4. Create BTS (Behind the scene) video for product launching event together with introduction of the new ambassador. What was the goal of the project? The scope of this project are planning of settings on the photography that will be using for static advertisement; second is how model poses on every scene on each settings. Wardrobe is also part of my execution, where the color theme falls to the GREE standard color which is royal blue. By combining these three, it concluded as a great plan. It also falls to my job as the final Quality Check on each shoot that been taken. Furthermore, videographer is one of my major job here and also being the director of videography. Every scenes, locations, settings, wardrobe were all in my decisions. In conclusion, this project had made a static advertisements for GREE Philippines company and also video for social media purposes.

header: Nice to meet you,I'm Kart Fronda
body: Create awesome websites on your computer! No code & free. Publish anywhere. 9 					 						Years of experience 150 					Successful projects

How I started as agraphic artist & web developer First I were a anime fan and an artist of anime. That inspired me to become a graphic artist. I learned to used photoshop as my first app to create digital arts. The school which I had attended taught us about basic web language (HTML). That day my mind was astound by making codes. I did practicing everyday and every time on HTML languages and as well creating digital arts on photoshop. And without knowing, it became my hobby. As I graduated from my college, I pursue my hobby to become a job. And that's how I became of who I am today. My story My first designback in 2015 Way back 2015, I designed a packaging box for Nestle KitKat for their special event called "Meeting of the Minds". This project had been started from nothing which means I'm the one who designed the graphics as well. The client also wants to include the attendee's name so the production of the box would be layout multiple times on canvas that ready for printing.I also designed here the cutting marks for the machine and also the fold marks as you can see in this photo. Later on the client decided not just only the name would be printed but also their pictures. It was time consuming project but it was fun and excited as it was my first project for a big client.
Over 9 years of experience and 100+ projects

Digital Graphics DesignVideo EditingPhotographer VideographerWeb Developer3D Interior Design 					 				 			 			 				 					 						 							Achievements 					 					 					Employee of the Year 2019Most Innovative Employee of the Year 2019Guest Speaker: "Learning Robotics using Arduino 1 & 2" 				 			 			 				 					 						 							Top Clients 					 					 					 						GREE PhilippinesSan Miguel Corp.NestleDHLSeikoQ Power Station

For editing graphics media and better sizing for large scale format.
